contest-event.event-date:
April 20, 1986 D Thurrock Arts Council (Open Championship Section)
Thurrock Arts Council (Open Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest Thurrock Arts Council Contest thurrock-arts-council-open-championship-section
Thurrock Civic Hall, Grays, Essex, England, UK Prizes 1st £120, 2nd £75.
Best euphonium - B. Jenkins (Aveley).
5 bands competed.
Not 27th April as originally given (source: Rakeway Brass Band Yearbook)
Aug. 24, 2012, 1:13 p.m. June 9, 2014, 1 p.m.
1 Aveley Band Nigel Taken
2 Tilbury Nigel Taken
3 Colchester Band Stephen Kenna
4 Daventry Brass Kevin Morgan
Unknown Result London College of Music James Gourlay
